mutants.code:
import re

def common_keywords(string1, string2):
    string1 = re.sub('', '', string1)
    string2 = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', '', string2)
    words1 = string1.lower().split()
    words2 = string2.lower().split()
    common_keywords = sorted(set(words1) & set(words2))
    return common_keywords

import re

def common_keywords(string1, string2):
    string1 = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', 'MUTATED', string1)
    string2 = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', '', string2)
    words1 = string1.lower().split()
    words2 = string2.lower().split()
    common_keywords = sorted(set(words1) & set(words2))
    return common_keywords

import re

def common_keywords(string1, string2):
    string1 = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', '', string1)
    string2 = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', '', string2)
    words1 = string1.lower().split()
    words2 = string2.lower().split()
    common_keywords = sorted(set(words1) | set(words2))
    return common_keywords
